attributes.action: apologise to the government of Iran for the act of trespass in Iranian waters.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anyone with an ounce of sense realises that Royal Navy personnel did in fact trespass in Iranian sovereign waters and that they acted as agent provocateurs. This petition requests that the prime minister shows that his moral integrity has not completely evaporated by issuing an apology to the innocent Iranians, who were acting in the name of national security.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
